about_the_game:
Soundtrack of Red Spider Series.

Sample this album ->

This package also includes the Red Spider Chronicle, which is sold separately.

  • Red Spider: Vengeance Title "Red Spider Lily" composed by Yasunori Shiono

  • Red Spider: Vengeance Opening "Red Spider" composed by Yasunori Shiono

detailed_description:
Update Notes

Fixed a corrupted manifest file, which prevented music files from being downloaded in some environments.(2023/10/01)
